buildings.title: Rwanda Revenue Authority Building
buildings.description: Structural design and construction supervision for the RRA headquarters in Kigali. This project involved complex engineering solutions for a 12-story office building with underground parking facilities.
buildings.challenge: The project required innovative structural solutions to accommodate the building's unique architectural design while ensuring earthquake resistance.
buildings.solution: Our team implemented a reinforced concrete frame structure with shear walls strategically placed to provide lateral stability against seismic forces.
buildings.results: The completed building stands as a landmark in Kigali's skyline and provides a modern, efficient workspace for over 500 employees.

buildings.title: Kigali Business Center
buildings.description: Design and project management for a mixed-use commercial complex featuring retail spaces, offices, and a conference center.
buildings.challenge: The project required integration of multiple functions within a limited urban space while maintaining aesthetic appeal and functionality.
buildings.solution: We developed a modular design approach that allowed for efficient space utilization and flexibility for future modifications.
buildings.results: The complex has achieved 95% occupancy within its first year and has become a hub for business activities in the area.

buildings.title: Nyarugenge Office Tower
buildings.description: Comprehensive engineering services for a 15-story office tower with sustainable design features and smart building technology.
buildings.challenge: The client required a modern, sustainable building that would minimize operational costs while providing a premium office environment.
buildings.solution: We incorporated passive cooling design, rainwater harvesting, and solar panels to reduce energy consumption and environmental impact.
buildings.results: The building achieved LEED Gold certification and reduced operational costs by 30% compared to similar structures.

airports.title: Kigali International Airport Expansion
airports.description: Engineering consultancy for terminal expansion and runway improvements at Rwanda's primary international airport.
airports.challenge: The airport needed to expand capacity while remaining operational throughout the construction process.
airports.solution: We developed a phased implementation plan that allowed for continuous airport operations with minimal disruption to passengers and airlines.
airports.results: The expanded terminal increased passenger capacity by 60% and improved operational efficiency.

airports.title: Kamembe Airport Modernization
airports.description: Comprehensive renovation and modernization of Rwanda's second-largest airport, including runway extension and terminal upgrades.
airports.challenge: The existing facilities were outdated and unable to accommodate modern aircraft and increasing passenger numbers.
airports.solution: Our team redesigned the runway to international standards and modernized the terminal building with improved passenger facilities.
airports.results: The airport can now accommodate larger aircraft and handle three times the previous passenger capacity.

airports.title: Rubavu Airport Feasibility Study
airports.description: Comprehensive feasibility study and preliminary design for a new regional airport to serve Rwanda's western province.
airports.challenge: The project required careful assessment of environmental impacts, economic viability, and technical feasibility in a challenging topographic setting.
airports.solution: We conducted extensive site investigations, environmental studies, and economic analyses to determine the optimal airport location and configuration.
airports.results: The feasibility study provided a solid foundation for government decision-making on the project's implementation.

water_supply.title: Gatsibo Water Supply System
water_supply.description: Design and implementation of water supply system serving 50,000 residents in Gatsibo District.
water_supply.challenge: The district faced severe water shortages, with many residents traveling long distances to access clean water.
water_supply.solution: We designed a comprehensive water supply system including water treatment facilities, storage tanks, and distribution networks.
water_supply.results: The project has provided reliable access to clean water for 50,000 residents, reducing waterborne diseases and improving quality of life.

water_supply.title: Ngoma District Water Treatment Plant
water_supply.description: Design and construction supervision of a modern water treatment plant with capacity to serve 75,000 people.
water_supply.challenge: The existing water supply was contaminated and insufficient to meet the growing population's needs.
water_supply.solution: We designed a multi-stage treatment plant incorporating sedimentation, filtration, and disinfection processes to ensure water quality.
water_supply.results: The plant now provides 15,000 cubic meters of clean water daily, meeting international quality standards.

water_supply.title: Rubavu Urban Water Network
water_supply.description: Rehabilitation and expansion of the urban water distribution network in Rubavu town to improve service coverage and reliability.
water_supply.challenge: The existing network suffered from high leakage rates and inadequate pressure, resulting in unreliable service.
water_supply.solution: We redesigned the network using hydraulic modeling and replaced aging pipes with modern materials to reduce leakage.
water_supply.results: The project reduced water losses from 40% to 15% and increased service coverage from 65% to 90% of the urban population.

roads.title: Kigali Urban Roads Upgrade
roads.description: Design and supervision of urban road upgrades in Kigali, including drainage systems, pedestrian walkways, and traffic management features.
roads.challenge: The existing road network was inadequate for increasing traffic volumes and lacked proper drainage and pedestrian facilities.
roads.solution: We designed comprehensive road upgrades incorporating modern urban design principles and sustainable drainage solutions.
roads.results: The upgraded roads have improved traffic flow, reduced flooding incidents, and enhanced pedestrian safety.

roads.title: Eastern Province Highway Rehabilitation
roads.description: Rehabilitation and widening of a 120 km highway connecting major towns in Rwanda's Eastern Province.
roads.challenge: The existing highway had deteriorated significantly and could not handle increasing traffic volumes and heavy loads.
roads.solution: We designed a comprehensive rehabilitation including pavement strengthening, bridge repairs, and geometric improvements to enhance safety.
roads.results: The rehabilitated highway has reduced travel time by 40% and improved access to markets for rural communities.
